name: Line Bowling
description:
Let's draw lines and knock over bowling pins!
The rule is easy but also flexible, so your problem solving ideas may be unique.
All your need to do is guiding a ball through a specified point, and hit as many bowling pins as possible during this period. Gravity is the most easily overlooked but the most important factor.

Features:
Every puzzle has many different solutions, can you solve it in the most unique way?
Play for free, play it anytime anywhere
Suitable for all age and gender
Bowling-specific blow effect
180 of physics puzzles, can't stop playing

Please note that this is a beta release.
For suggestions or bug reporting, please send email to bowling@gamegou.com
